Magic
Spell Slots: W0: 5; W1: 4; W2: 3; W3: 3; W4: 3; W5: 3; W6: 2; W7: 2; W8: 1; W9: 1 Attack: W: 9 Spell DC: W: 17
Spells:
Arcane Gate (W6 Conj): R10' Creates a portal pair that can teleport creatures 500' for conc up to 10 min
Blight (W4 Necr): R30' target suffers 8d8 HP necrotic (Constitution half; plant target suffers Disadv and maximum damage on failure) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Blindness/Deafness (W2 Necr): R30' Inflicts choice of blindness or deafness on target (Constitution ends) for 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Chill Touch (W0 Necr): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d8 HP necrotic and target cannot heal for 1 rd, undead also suffer Disadv on self attack for 1 rd
Cloudkill (W5 Conj): R120' 20' radius inflicts 5d8 HP poison (Constitution half) and moves away 10'/rd for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Cone Of Cold (W5 Evoc): 60' cone inflicts 8d8 HP cold (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Confusion (W4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly 10% wander/50% do nothing/20% attack an adjacent creature/20% act normally (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level increases radius by 5']
Dancing Lights (W0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and move 60'/rd for conc up to 1 min
Expeditious Retreat (W1 Tran): Self gains a bonus Dash 1/rd for conc up to 10 min
Feeblemind (W8 Ench): R150' Target suffers 4d6 HP psychic and reduction of Charisma and Intelligence to 1 (Intelligence HP only)
Finger Of Death (W7 Necr): R60' Target suffers 7d8+30 HP necrotic (Constitution half); becomes an obedient zombie if killed
Fire Bolt (W0 Evoc): R120' Ranged spell inflicts 4d10 HP fire or ignites an unattended flammable target
Gust Of Wind (W2 Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Strength neg), inflicts half movement, and has a 50% chance of extinguishing flames for conc up to 1 min
Hypnotic Pattern (W3 Illu): R120' Creatures in a 30' cube become charmed (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min
Longstrider (W1 Tran): Touched gains +10' Speed for 1 hr [+Level affects +1 target]
Magic Jar (W6 Necr): R100' Self possesses target body and traps target soul in a prepared jar (Charisma neg)
Magic Weapon (W2 Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for conc up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2/+3 bonus at level 4/6]
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound (W4 Conj): R30' Invisible watchdog barks at intruders w/in 30' and attacks those w/in 5' (+9 4d8 HP piercing) for 8 hr
Prismatic Spray (W7 Evoc): 60' cone randomly inflicts one of: 10d6 HP fire, acid, lightning, poison, or cold (Dexterity half); restrains (Dexterity neg) and petrifies after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes neg); blinds (Dexterity neg) and banishes to another plane (Wisdom neg)
Shocking Grasp (W0 Evoc): Touched suffers 4d8 HP lightning and cannot use Reaction until next turn
Silent Image (W1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube illusion (Investigation detects) for conc up to 10 min
Stinking Cloud (W3 Conj): R90' 20' radius inflicts loss of action (Constitution neg) for conc up to 1 min
Teleportation Circle (W5 Conj): R10' Creates a portal that provides access to similar circles for 1 rd
Tenser's Floating Disk (W1 Conj): R30' 3' x 1" force disk floats 3' high 20' behind self, holding 500 lbs for 1 hr [R]
Time Stop (W9 Tran): Self gains 1d4+1 turns (affecting another creature or moving more than 1000' away ends)
Tongues (W3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Arcane Recovery: May recover 10 spell slot levels (level 6 maximum) during a short rest 1/long rest
Empowered Evocation: +3 HP evocation spell damage
Evocation Savant: May copy evocation spells into spellbook for half cost
Flash Recall: Swap prepared spell 1/short rest
Mystic Conflux: May attune 4 items, cast Identify 1/long rest
Overchannel: Evocation spell up to level 5 inflicts maximum damage, self takes 2d12+ HP necrotic damage per spell level after first use/long rest
Potent Cantrip: Target that makes save vs. self cantrip takes half damage
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Sculpt Spells: May protect spell level + 1 targets from self evocation spell effects
Signature Spells: May cast 2 chosen W3 spells 1/short rest
Spell Mastery: May cast chosen W1 spell and W2 spell at will
Spelldriver: Cast additional level 1 - 2 spell/rd
Notes
Validation Errors: Feat Allocation: 5 available vs. 7 allocated
